# Body Landmarks

**API Collection**

The body landmarks that Vision detects.

## Overview

The illustration below shows the nineteen body points that you can detect with [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNDetectHumanBodyPoseRequest].



## Head

- **bodyLandmarkKeyLeftEye**: The left eye.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyRightEye**: The right eye.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyLeftEar**: The left ear.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyRightEar**: The right ear.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyNose**: The nose.
- **bodyLandmarkRegionKeyFace**: A group key identifying the face, which includes the eyes, ears, and nose.

## Torso

- **bodyLandmarkKeyNeck**: The center point of the neck.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyLeftShoulder**: The left shoulder.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyRightShoulder**: The right shoulder.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyLeftHip**: The left hip.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyRightHip**: The right hip.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyRoot**: The center point of the waist.
- **bodyLandmarkRegionKeyTorso**: A group key identifying the torso, which includes the neck, shoulders, hips, and root.

## Arms

- **bodyLandmarkKeyRightWrist**: The right wrist.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyRightElbow**: The right elbow.
- **bodyLandmarkRegionKeyRightArm**: A group key identifying the landmarks of the right arm.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyLeftWrist**: The left wrist.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyLeftElbow**: The left elbow.
- **bodyLandmarkRegionKeyLeftArm**: A group key identifying the landmarks of the left arm.

## Legs

- **bodyLandmarkKeyRightKnee**: The right knee.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyRightAnkle**: The right ankle.
- **bodyLandmarkRegionKeyRightLeg**: A group key identifying the landmarks of the right leg.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyLeftKnee**: The left knee.
- **bodyLandmarkKeyLeftAnkle**: The left ankle.
- **bodyLandmarkRegionKeyLeftLeg**: A group key identifying the landmarks of the left leg.

## All Landmarks

- **all**: A group key identifying all landmarks.

## Landmarks

- **Hand Landmarks**: The hand landmarks that Vision detects.
